channel.title: Need help with welcome message

item.title: Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @visionpk visionpk
item.description:
@visionpk wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Replace your login text:

sM("welcome to Dragonscape 562 24/7 server"); sM("LATEST UPDATE: the party room! at ::party"); sM("support us by making advertisement videos for youtube!"); sM("[Message of the week]: donate to recieve awesome powers and items!"); sM("working on customs atm :)");
With: q4help();[/quote] err what?

so basically i get rid off all my text and replace it with just this:

q4help();

???

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @visionpk visionpk
item.description:
@visionpk wrote:

this is my quest interface code:

public void q4help() { sendQuest("Welcome to dragonscape 562", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q4 == 0){ sendQuest("welcome to dragonscape 562 24/7 server", 8147); sendQuest("LATEST UPDATE: the party room! at ::party", 8148); sendQuest("support us by making advertisement vids for youtube!", 8149); sendQuest("donate to recieve powers and items", 8150); sendQuest("working on customs atm :)", 8151); }

this is my welcome message code:

sM("welcome to Dragonscape 562 24/7 server"); sM("LATEST UPDATE: the party room! at ::party"); sM("support us by making advertisement videos for youtube!"); sM("[Message of the week]: donate to recieve awesome powers and items!"); sM("working on customs atm :)");

i need to make this:

into this when some1 logs in:

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I believe Delta uses a sendQuest variable to send text via interface so you would need to have the interface open upon login instead of just a sM.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @visionpk visionpk
item.description:
@visionpk wrote:

oh i just used the quest list for that… how do i make it so when a player loggs in that automatically pops up on their screen. this is the code i used to put it in the quest list: public void q4help() { sendQuest("Welcome to dragonscape 562", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q4 == 0){ sendQuest("welcome to dragonscape 562 24/7 server", 8147); sendQuest("LATEST UPDATE: the party room! at ::party", 8148); sendQuest("support us by making advertisement vids for youtube!", 8149); sendQuest("donate to recieve powers and items", 8150); sendQuest("working on customs atm :)", 8151); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @visionpk visionpk
item.description:
@visionpk wrote:

kk here is what shows up in the chatbox when a player logs in:

and here is the code i have for it in my client.java:

sM("welcome to Dragonscape 562 24/7 server"); sM("LATEST UPDATE: the party room! at ::party"); sM("support us by making advertisement videos for youtube!"); sM("[Message of the week]: donate to recieve awesome powers and items!"); sM("working on customs atm :)");

but i instead want to replace it with this when a player logs in:
